entry.title: Woman's story from hospital bed brings Anderson Cooper to tears

media:group.media:title: Woman's story from hospital bed brings Anderson Cooper to tears
media:group.media:description: CNN's Randi Kaye talks to a woman who may lose her hands as one of the side effects due to having coronavirus. #CNN #News

entry.title: Kamala Harris reacts to Trump calling her 'nasty'

media:group.media:title: Kamala Harris reacts to Trump calling her 'nasty'
media:group.media:description:
In their first joint interview since the 2020 Democratic National Convention, Joe Biden and Kamala Harris responded to President Trump's comments calling Harris "nasty."
#Kamala #CNN #News

entry.title: Ex-Trump official: Fox host was Trump's shadow chief of staff

media:group.media:title: Ex-Trump official: Fox host was Trump's shadow chief of staff
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Anderson Cooper talks with Miles Taylor, a former Department of Homeland Security official in the Trump administration, about why he called Fox host Lou Dobbs Trump's "shadow chief of staff."
#CNN #News

entry.title: Bannon calls arrest and charges a 'political hit job'

media:group.media:title: Bannon calls arrest and charges a 'political hit job'
media:group.media:description:
President Donald Trump's former adviser Steve Bannon called his arrest a "political hit job" and vowed to fight the charges against him of fraud tied to a fundraising campaign purportedly aimed at supporting Trump's border wall.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Senator grills USPS chief: 'Millions of people are impacted by what you do':

media:group.media:title: Senator grills USPS chief: 'Millions of people are impacted by what you do':
media:group.media:description:
Sen. Jacky Rosen (D-NV) grills Postmaster General Louis DeJoy about changes he's made at the United States Postal Service right ahead of the 2020 election, asking him if he's done analysis on the impacts of his policies.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Pence: I've got a news flash for Joe Biden

media:group.media:title: Pence: I've got a news flash for Joe Biden
media:group.media:description:
Vice President Mike Pence slams Joe Biden for criticizing President Trump's handling of the coronavirus pandemic.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Berman to Pence: How can you not know about QAnon?

media:group.media:title: Berman to Pence: How can you not know about QAnon?
media:group.media:description: CNN's John Berman presses Vice President Mike Pence on the QAnon conspiracy theory after President Donald Trump seemed to embrace the fringe group. #CNN #News

entry.title: Russian opposition leader hospitalized after suspected poisoning

media:group.media:title: Russian opposition leader hospitalized after suspected poisoning
media:group.media:description:
Russian opposition leader and Kremlin critic Alexey Navalny was removed to hospital after falling ill in what his spokesperson has said is a suspected poisoning. CNN's Matthew Chance reports.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Biden vows to end 'chapter of American darkness' in DNC speech

media:group.media:title: Biden vows to end 'chapter of American darkness' in DNC speech
media:group.media:description: Want more of the latest 2020 election videos? Watch them here: https://cnn.it/3g9mMAL During his speech at the 2020 Democratic National Conventiona, Joe Biden formally accepted the Democratic party’s presidential nomination and vowed that "united we can and will overcome this season of darkness in America." #Biden #CNN #News

entry.title: Teen shares how Joe Biden helped him with his stutter

media:group.media:title: Teen shares how Joe Biden helped him with his stutter
media:group.media:description:
Want more of the latest 2020 election videos? Watch here: https://cnn.it/3g9mMAL During the 2020 Democratic National Convention, Brayden Harrington, 13, shares how meeting Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden gave him confidence to work through his stutter.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Julia Louis-Dreyfus jokes about 'Kamala' name controversy at DNC

media:group.media:title: Julia Louis-Dreyfus jokes about 'Kamala' name controversy at DNC
media:group.media:description:
Want more of the latest 2020 election videos? Watch here: https://cnn.it/3g9mMAL 'Veep' star Julia Louis-Dreyfuss joked about the the controversy over the pronunciation of 2020 Vice Presidential candidate Kamala Harris' name at the expense of Vice President Mike Pence.
#DNC #JuliaLouisDreyfus #CNN #News
